New Records: The Cleveland Cavaliers achieved a 9-0 start to the 2024-25 season, a franchise record.
Darius Garland scored a career-high 40 points in the game.
Key Match Events: The Cavaliers made 17 three-pointers as a team, with significant contributions from Sam Merrill, Georges Niang, and Caris LeVert.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers have been playing team basketball, emphasizing three-point shooting and balanced performances from their roster.
